DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: SATO, S. S.;S. S. Sato;Sato, S. S.;Sandra S. Sato;Sato, Sandra Sayuri;SATO, SANDRA SAYURI;Sato, Sandra S.;SATO, SANDRA S.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduao em Licenciatura e Bacharelado em Matemtica pela Universidade Braz Cubas (1998), Mestrado em Cincia pelo Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica (2003) e Doutorado em Cincias pela Escola Politcnica da Universidade de So Paulo (2015). Tem experincia na rea de Fsica, com nfase em tica, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: geometria, fsica, conformador, tangran e origami.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in Bachelor and Bachelor of Mathematics from Braz Cubas University (1998), Master of Science from the Technological Institute of Aeronautics (2003) and Doctorate in Science from the Polytechnic School of So Paulo University(2015). Has experience in the area of Physics, with emphasis on optics, acting on the following topics: geometry, physics, shaper, tangram and origami.

GRADUACAO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-DE-CONCLUSAO-DE-CURSO: Modelamneto de espalhamento de eltrons no tomo de He.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The formation of an optical waveguide based on residual thermal stress in bismuth germanate (BGO) substrate, the Pockels electro-optic effect and the modal optical analyses were investigated for optical modulation purpose. A full vector finite element based program was used to perform the analyses. The optical propagation characteristics of stress-induced waveguides and main electro-optic parameters were evaluated considering different geometrical designs.
